mapper.select: SELECT Q.*, U.USERNAME, U.SIGNATUREQ FROM QUESTION Q JOIN USER U ON Q.USERID = U.ID WHERE Q.QID IN ( ${qids} ) ORDER BY Q.QID DESC

SELECT Q.*, COUNT(R.AID) AS answersnum FROM QUESTION Q LEFT JOIN ANSWER R ON Q.QID = R.QID WHERE Q.USERID = #{Pageinfo.userid} GROUP BY R.QID ORDER BY R.QID DESC LIMIT #{Pageinfo.start}, #{Pageinfo.pageSize}
